subject: feat(query): add search help modal with concept guide and examples
body:
Add QueryHelpModal accessible via a ? icon button in the QueryBuilder
header. Two-tab layout: "How It Works" explains each filter type
(labels, properties, title, connections, AND/OR, NOT, pipeline steps,
advanced mode) in plain non-technical language; "Examples" provides 8
practical step-by-step instructions for common queries using the demo
dataset.

Follows the ConventionsModal pattern (overlay + close button + tabs).
Modal state is self-contained in QueryBuilder â€” not routed through
App.tsx. Responsive with 44px+ touch targets on mobile.
